reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks expensive and appreciate its soft, butter-like feel, with one noting it hits midway between knee and ankle. Moreover, the material feels like real leather, and customers like its color, with one describing it as a beautiful green faux dress. Additionally, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality and value, with customers noting it's much nicer than expected for the price. However, opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it's too big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG fabulous
items.body: Omg, very soft and supple. Very leather like, I would say even better. Nice weight which adds to the quality. Fits true to size. Very flattering silhouette, very feminine and elegant. I bought in all available colors. I would love for it to come in blue. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, style and price
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. The faux leather is so close to real leather and the fit is great. I'm 5'2" 138 lbs. I ordered a size Med. I ordered this before in green and get so many complements. It can be worn for a semi formal affair. I had it shortened some just for my taste. Great purchase at a great price. Read more
items.author: Wanda H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS dress! Soft,Lined and authentic leather look dress!
items.body: Soft pu leather that looks like authentic leather. This dress has everything! Itâ€™s soft, lined, medium thickness and so comfortable. I got both a small & xs in the black, green & red (wine color). The xs worked best. Itâ€™s got some stretch to it and the waist & hips looked more streamlined with the smaller size. Zipper is just ok! Itâ€™s comfortable to wear and looks so similar to one at Anthropologie. The material used are the same too! Itâ€™s 1/3 of the price at Amazon and looks like it cost at least $200. I love how itâ€™s fitted in the bodice then flows from right under waist with the enclosed same material tie belt! This is a favorite buy of mine frequently m Amazon. Husband loves it on me and encouraged me to get al of the colors! Absolutely in love with this beautiful luxe find! Iâ€™m 125 lbs, 34 D bra, waist 25â€ and I kept the XS dresses Read more
items.author: Kellyâ€™s closet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boutique Quality at an Amazon Price
items.body: Ok. HOLY COW this dress is literally a steal. It fits like a glove and feels like it cost a couple hundred dollars. Who knew faux leather could be so soft and luxurious? It is a thick material, definitely not see through, beautifully lined, and just a few wrinkles/creases from being packed. I am hoping to turn it inside out and maybe take a steamer to it. The beautiful gold is screaming holiday party! I cannot wait to wear this around the Christmas holiday. Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning but not for short girls
items.body: First, let me say this dress is beautiful. Stunning. Itâ€™s well-made at a great price point and looks like it costs $1000. Unfortunately, the skirt is soooo long and full that it just overwhelms me at 5 foot five and short waisted. And it doesnâ€™t look like it could be easily hemmed. Iâ€™m truly sad about having to send this back. Itâ€™s true to size and looks gorgeous on except for the length. I hope they make a petite version of this. Read more
items.author: KAinLA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: The dress was surprisingly beautiful! It fit perfectly, didnâ€™t look cheap, at all and the color was as shown. The zipper worked fine, it was overall a great purchase! Read more
items.author: Ramona Brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful faux leather dress ðŸ‘—
items.body: Oh my goodness! This dress is a must have . It runs small so I sized up . I wear a size large because I have big breast so I order a size xxl I also like lose fit on my dresses. If you like it a little more skin thigh go just one size up . I highly recommend it looks and feels amazing. Well made . The stitching ðŸ§µ is just well done . Totally worth the price. Read more
items.author: Miss Bee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stay tuned
items.body: I do love this dress. The pros: The material is thick, so it's a winter/fall dress for sure. My plan is to wear it for our family Christmas dinner. The color is just as it appears in the picture and there is some stretch to the material. The sash is long and versatile, so I'm debating tying it in a bow in the back or in the front. I don't think there's a 'right' answer. The cons/concerns: The dress did come wrinkled, since it was vacuum sealed. While I tried to steam it on my own, I felt like I would be doing it for daaaaaaays, so I took it to my dry cleaner. We'll see if they can get creases to come out. Taking it to them automatically doubled the cost of the dress, but I had no other choice. Read more
items.author: a

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gold, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
